        <h1>Standard & Poor's NetAdvantage</h1>
        
        <p class="subheadertext"></p>
        <p class="byline">By Meredith N., Business Reference Librarian</p>
        <p class="dateline">Wednesday, February 01, 2012</p>   
        <div class="articletext">
            <p><span class="articlelocation"><p>Doing company and business research doesn't have to be a daunting task if you use the right tools. <a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=StandardPoorsNetAdvantage">Standard &amp; Poor's NetAdvantage</a> offers an easy interface to find stock and company reports, industry overviews, and fund reports from publicly traded companies across the country. </p>
<p>You can also access The Outlook, S&amp;P's premier investment advisory newsletter, to get the latest news and trends in stock and fund trading and information. <b>This database is also available from home with your JCL Library Card number and PIN.</b> </p>
<p>You can get more information on how to use the database on our website via our <a href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/upload/library/docs/pdf/researchguides/StandardPoors_NetAdvantage.pdf">S&amp;P Research Guide</a> or our <a href="http://www.screencast.com/t/ysLSVi1z">video tutorial</a>.</p>
<p>Have any questions? Contact our Business Reference specialists by <a href="/templates/JCL_XForm.aspx?id=2767">email</a> and we can assist you, or call the reference line at 913-826-4600.</p></span>
             
            </p>
        </div>
        
        <p class="moretext">
            <a href="/templates/JCL_NewsList.aspx?id=14015" title="News list main page.">more...</a>
        </p>

       <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><div class="xmlitem" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format"><h3><span class="xmlfeedtitle"><a href="http://calendar.jocolibrary.org/evanced/lib/eventsignup.asp?ID=21172">The Resume Reboot Workshop</a></span></h3><p class="xmlitemdate">Thursday, September 05, 2013 at 1:00 PM<br /><span class="xmlfeedlocation">Central Resource Library</span></p></div><div class="xmlitem" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format"><h3><span class="xmlfeedtitle"><a href="http://calendar.jocolibrary.org/evanced/lib/eventsignup.asp?ID=22853">The Most Effective Networking for Job Seeking</a></span></h3><p class="xmlitemdate">Monday, September 09, 2013 at 6:30 PM<br /><span class="xmlfeedlocation">Central Resource Library</span></p></div><div class="xmlitem" xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format"><h3><span class="xmlfeedtitle"><a href="http://calendar.jocolibrary.org/evanced/lib/eventsignup.asp?ID=22383">The Art of Interviewing</a></span></h3><p class="xmlitemdate">Monday, September 23, 2013 at 6:30 PM<br /><span class="xmlfeedlocation">Central Resource Library</span></p></div>

<div class="tabcontentstyle">
<div id="tcontent1" class="tabcontent">
<p><strong>Business databases</strong><br />Available from home or office. <a href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047">Library card and PIN</a>&nbsp;required. </p><!--<P>Search for business articles:</P>
<FORM method=get action=http://access.gale.com/cgi-bin/widgets/v2/search.pl target=_blank>
<P><INPUT id=psx_search class=searchfield type=input name=keyword> <INPUT id=psx_go class=searchbutton1 value=search type=submit> <INPUT value=26852__jcl_cen type=hidden name=id> <INPUT value=PPBE_BCPM_EB26 type=hidden name=prod> <INPUT type=hidden name=host> <INPUT type=hidden name=pub> <INPUT value=psx type=hidden name=dir> </P>-->
<p><strong>Individual database links:</strong></p>
<ul class="resourcelist">
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a></span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=AdvertisingRedBooks">Advertising RedBooks</a><em><br />Provides information on advertisers, including annual advertising budgets, brand names, current agencies, and key personnel as well as advertising agenciesâ annual billings, accounts and areas of specialization.</em></li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=24161" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a title="library card and PIN required" href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=BusinessInsightsGlobal">Business Insights: Global</a><br />This database provides statistical data, company and industry information, case studies, comparison charts, and much more on global businesess and economies.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a title="library card and PIN required" href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=GVRLBusPlansCollection">Business Plans Handbook</a>&nbsp; <br />Provides a collection of business plans compiled by entrepreneurs seeking funding for small businesses.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=BusinessSourceComplete">Business Source Complete</a><br />Provides full text for over 2,100 journals in many areas and includes market research reports, industry reports, company profiles, and SWOT analyses.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/librarycard" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="/upload/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=DBMillionDollarDatabase">D and B Million Dollar Database Premier</a>&nbsp;<br />Find directory information on both public and private companies with more than a million dollars in revenue. Company profiles include sales, number of employees, contact and location information, and executive biographies.<br /><!--<BR><SPAN class=colorred>If you encounter problems with advanced searches in the Million Dollar Database, please contact us for assistance at (913) 826-4600.&nbsp;Our apologies for the inconveience</SPAN>.--></li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=DemographicsNow">DemographicsNow</a>&nbsp;<br />Provides detailed demographic information for use by businesses and entrepreneurs, including data such as income, housing, race, age, education, consumer expenditures, and more.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=GaleDirectoryLibrary">Gale Directory Library</a><br />Provides detailed directory entries from publications like <em>Market Share Reporter</em>, <em>Consultants and Consulting Organizations Directory</em>, and the <em>Directory of Publications and Broadcast Media</em> among others.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" />&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=KCBusinessJournal">Kansas City Business Journal</a>&nbsp;<br />Highlights local news, employment opportunities and career advice from 41 major city business journals, Including <em>the Kansas City Business Journal</em>.&nbsp;</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=KansasCityStarKansasNewspapers">Kansas City Star Plus Kansas Newspapers</a>&nbsp;<br />Read the full articles online from <em>The Kansas City Star</em> and other Kansas newspapers.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=MergentOnline">Mergent Online</a>&nbsp;<br />Mergent Online offers detailed financial data for public U.S. and international companies. Find more than 100,000 current and historical annual reports as well as detailed company histories.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=MergentWebReports">Mergent Web Reports</a>&nbsp;<br />This&nbsp;search interface for Mergent Online lets you locate equity reports according to their buy/sell ratings. In addition, the Mergent Web Reports interface also includes a search for corporate manuals, industry reports and company profiles.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=morningstar">Morningstar Investment Research Center </a><br />Find data on stocks, mutual funds, exchange-traded funds and closed-end funds. Read analyst reports and opinions on investments.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=RegionalBusinessNews">Regional Business News</a><br />Regional Business News provides full text for nearly 100 regional U.S. and Canadian business publications (including titles from Crain Communications).</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=ReferenceUSA">ReferenceUSA</a> - <a style="COLOR: green" href="http://www.screencast.com/t/rAC0C5MP">Video tutorial available!</a>&nbsp;<img style="CLEAR: right" class="icon" alt="video" src="/upload/library/i/icons/video.gif" width="20" height="20" /><br />Provides detailed information on more than 14 million U.S. businesses, and 210 million U.S. residents. </li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a></span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=Small Business Reference Center">Small Business Reference Center</a><em> <br />Provides a wide variety of information for business owners and entrepreneurs, including interviews, lectures, video tutorials, help in creating business plans, and other resources for small businesses, including full-text books from NOLO.</em></li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Available at any Library location." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2826" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Available at the Central Resource Library only." src="/upload/business/i/housesblue.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span><a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=SRDS">SRDS (Standard Rate &amp; Data Service)</a>&nbsp;<!-- - <SPAN style="COLOR: green">SRDS is temporarily unavailable. We are working to restore access as quickly as possible.</SPAN>--><br />SRDS provides profiles of media entities across multiple categories. You can evaluate potential avenues for marketing and advertising with policy, contact information and statistics available in each profile.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /> </a>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=StandardPoorsNetAdvantage">Standard &amp; Poor's NetAdvantage</a> - <a style="COLOR: green" href="http://www.screencast.com/t/ysLSVi1z">Video tutorial available!</a>&nbsp;<img style="CLEAR: right" class="icon" alt="video" src="/upload/library/i/icons/video.gif" width="20" height="20" /></span><br /><br />Offers access to stock reports, company reports, industry surveys, and fund reports, including features and commentary from Standard &amp; Poorâs on topics such as the economy, daily stock market activity, industry sectors, stocks, bonds, funds, and investment strategies. </li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><a title="Library card and PIN required." href="http://www.jocolibrary.org/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2047" target="_blank"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Library card and PIN required." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/business/i/librarycard.jpg" /></a>&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;<a href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=WallStreetJournal">Wall Street Journal</a>&nbsp;<br />Provides full-text articles, commentary and editorial opinions from <em>The</em> <em>Wall Street Journal</em>.&nbsp;</li><!--<LI><SPAN class=resourceaccess><A title="Available at any Library location." href="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2826" target=_blank orgurl="/templates/JCL_InfoPage.aspx?id=2826"><IMG class=noimgborder alt="Available at the Central Resource Library only." src="/upload/business/i/housesblue.jpg" orgurl="/upload/business/i/housesblue.jpg"></A>&nbsp;</SPAN><A href="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=WestlawNext" orgurl="http://db.jocolibrary.org/?db=WestlawNext">WestlawNext</A>&nbsp;<BR>This legal database provides online access to federal and state statutes, court cases, and forms. Also includes annotations and cross-references to related materials.</LI>--></ul></div>
<div id="tcontent2" class="tabcontent"><strong>More Resources</strong><br /><br />
<ul class="resourcelist">
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.kchedc.org/">Hispanic Economic Development Corporation (HEDC)</a><br />The Hispanic Economic Development Corporation (HEDC) was founded for the purpose of developing and implementing economic development initiatives that would positively contribute to the quality of life for Latinos in Kansas City.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.scorekc.org/">SCORE â Americaâs Small Business Counselors</a> <br />The Service Corps of Retired Executives (SCORE) is part of a national nonprofit association dedicated to entrepreneur education and the formation, growth and success of the nationâs small business. This group offers free and confidential business counseling tailored to meet the needs of your small business and your personal objectives along with workshops.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.ecjc.com/">The Enterprise Center of Johnson County</a><br />This group provides office space to budding small businesses, small business consulting and finance consulting services for a fee.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.kansaswbc.com/">Kansas Womenâs Business Center (KWBC)</a><br />This program of the Enterprise Center of Johnson County is geared specifically towards helping women entrepreneurs, the KWBC offers counseling, mentoring, training, and community networking opportunities.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.centerforbusiness.org/">Johnson County Community College Center for Business &amp; Technology</a><br />The Center for Business and Technology is committed to the lifelong learning of organizations and individuals in the greater Kansas City area. The Center strives to maximize the success of businesses, professionals and individuals by serving their current and emerging education, training and development needs to best serve its customers and JCCC.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.jccc.edu/ksbdc">Kansas Small Business Development Center (KSBDC)</a><br />The mission of the Kansas Small Business Development Center at Johnson County Community College is to increase economic prosperity in Kansas by helping entrepreneurs and small business owners start and grow their businesses through professional consulting, training, and resources.</li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Free Web site." src="http://e.jocolibrary.org/library/i/web.jpg" /></span><a href="http://www.kcsourcelink.org/">KCSourcelink</a><br />KCSourceLinkâs mission is to help small businesses in the 18-county Kansas City region&nbsp;grow and succeed.&nbsp;They provide small business with free, easy access to the help&nbsp;they need. </li></ul></div>
<div id="tcontent4" class="tabcontent"><strong>Recommended Business Books</strong><br /><em>Titles selected by librarians to help you through the process of starting a business,&nbsp;learning about&nbsp;leadership, or answering your legal business quesitons. You can place holds on these books (and others!) with a library card and PIN.</em>&nbsp; 
<ul class="resourcelist">

<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Book available at the Johnson County Library." src="http://www.jocolibrary.org/upload/library/i/icons/bookicon.gif" />&nbsp;<a href="http://jocolibrary.bibliocommons.com/list/show/98731951_meredithn/98864152_jocolibrary_-_adult_-_business_-_marketing_your_business">Marketing Your Business</a></span></li>
<li><span class="resourceaccess"><img class="noimgborder" alt="Book available at the Johnson County Library." src="http://www.jocolibrary.org/upload/library/i/icons/bookicon.gif" />&nbsp;<a href="http://jocolibrary.bibliocommons.com/list/show/98731951_meredithn/98882375_jocolibrary_-_adult_-_business_-_business_legal_books">Business Legal Books</a></span></li>
